name: DE4TH
description:
Overview:

DE4TH is an experiment on death positivity. What does that mean? Well, most video games portray death in a negative way, like an obstacle or failure. The question of this game is 'Does death always have to be a negative?' Anyway, turned into a walking simulator because of time constraints, but it's always fun to try and break convention.

Features:

  • Death
  • Walking
  • Pixels

Controls:

[WASD] - Move

[X] - Interact

A Game a Week [Week 8]:

This game is my eighth game for "a game a week". Every week, I will force myself to make and release a (terrible) game. It's like a ransom, except games instead of hostages...probably. You can follow my progress on twitter (@enathang) or on my website (pixelmancer.io). Stay tuned!
